DEVELOPING OT CYBERSECURITY ROADMAP

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.75)” font_size=”18px” width=”550″ align=”left”]Part 2: Selecting Standards & Components[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1603799974854{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #f4f4f4 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1636427249940{border-left-width: 4px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #0075bf !important;border-left-style: solid !important;}” width=”250″ align=”left”]

Cybersecurity Webinar Series

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/4″][vc_column_text font_size=”20″]Recognizing the need for securing your critical assets against attacks and breaches, the next logical step would be to look at the important pre-requisites of implementing an OT cybersecurity program covering program goals, policies, human talent, and standards & frameworks[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1640171398918{margin-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]With the evolution of technology and the cyber threat landscape, the response from major industrial stakeholders has taken the shape of certain frameworks, guidelines, and regulations to address cyber-security concerns. Our experts talk about the need for standards, examining ISO 27001, NIST Cybersecurity Framework (CSF), and ISA/IEC 62443 in a bit of detail while also discussing the significance of each standard, relevance to Operational Technology, and why a combination of standards works best.

This leads to a concluding discussion about regional & industrial standards that are formulated based on the three standards that have been previously discussed and minimum security capabilities for a mature OT cybersecurity program.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” remove_bottom_col_margin=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1640171451771{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Part Two: Selecting Standards & Components

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”10″]

Originally broadcasted on 8th February, 2022
